mapper.select: SELECT ci.CITY_NAME, ci.CITY_ADD, ci.CITY_VIEWS, ci.CITY_SEQ FROM SS_MEMBER mem, SS_INT_LOCAL intlo, SS_LOCAL lo, SS_COUNTRY co, SS_CITY ci, SS_COMMENT com WHERE mem.MEMBER_SEQ = intlo.MEMBER_SEQ AND intlo.LOCAL_SEQ = lo.LOCAL_SEQ AND lo.LOCAL_SEQ = co.LOCAL_SEQ AND co.COUNTRY_SEQ = ci.COUNTRY_SEQ AND mem.EMAIL = #{EMAIL} GROUP BY ci.CITY_NAME ORDER BY ci.CITY_VIEWS DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT ci.CITY_NAME, TRUNCATE(AVG(com.SS_STAR),1) AS AVG_STAR FROM SS_CITY ci, SS_COMMENT com WHERE ci.CITY_SEQ = com.CITY_SEQ GROUP BY ci.CITY_NAME
mapper.update: UPDATE SS_CITY SET CITY_VIEWS = CITY_VIEWS+1 WHERE CITY_SEQ = #{CITY_SEQ}
mapper.select: SELECT LANDMARK_NAME, LANDMARK_EXP, LANDMARK_ADDR FROM SS_TRAVEL_INFO WHERE CITY_SEQ = #{CITY_SEQ}
SELECT COMMENT_CON, COMMENT_SEQ, SS_STAR FROM SS_COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_SEQ = #{COMMENT_SEQ}
mapper.update: UPDATE SS_COMMENT SET COMMENT_CON = #{COMMENT_CON}, SS_STAR = #{SS_STAR} WHERE COMMENT_SEQ = #{COMMENT_SEQ}
mapper.select: SELECT m.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.EMAIL AS MEMBER_EMAIL, c.COMMENT_SEQ, c.COMMENT_CON, c.SS_STAR, c.REGISTRY_DATE FROM SS_MEMBER m, SS_COMMENT c WHERE m.MEMBER_SEQ = c.MEMBER_SEQ AND c.CITY_SEQ = #{CITY_SEQ} ORDER BY c.REGISTRY_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SS_COMMENT VALUES( #{COMMENT_SEQ}, #{MEMBER_SEQ}, #{CITY_SEQ}, #{COMMENT_CON}, 'Y', #{SS_STAR}, #{MEMBER_SEQ}, now(), #{MEMBER_SEQ}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.COUNTRY_NAME, c.COUNTRY_SEQ FROM SS_LOCAL l, SS_COUNTRY c WHERE l.LOCAL_SEQ = c.LOCAL_SEQ AND LOCAL_NAME = #{LOCAL_NAME}
SELECT ci.CITY_NAME, ci.CITY_SEQ FROM SS_COUNTRY co, SS_CITY ci WHERE co.COUNTRY_SEQ = ci.COUNTRY_SEQ AND co.COUNTRY_SEQ = #{COUNTRY_SEQ}
